lead_paragraph: When 19-year-old American Yijun Feng played Spaniard Zhiwen "Juanito" He on Saturday, Feng entered the table tennis match with a slight but unusual advantage, despite being outranked and lacking comparable experience.

headline.print_headline: At the Olympics, Table Tennis May Be the Fountain of Youth
headline.main: At the Olympics, Table Tennis May Be the Fountain of Youth
